name: Lianshi
description:
• Q - Quit the game
  • Arrow keys - Move
  • A - Normal attack
  • S - Charged attack
  • (D - Spirit attack which is not implemented yet)
  • Shift+arrows - Strafe movement although that kind of movement is a little confusing due to the fixed camera rotation.
  • Escape - Pause the game and show the menu.
    • You can use S or Q to start or quit the game in the menu
